Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelView

Class ModelView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelView.ModelView
public class ModelView extends Object
ModelView is a light version of the model that is present on the client. The class contains all information that is useful for the client in order to let the user know every information of the game without requesting it to the server.
